title: Riot can Karma have some love?
body:
For real. Im not support player. Im adc player but im sick of this useless champ on my lane. She can do...nothing. Compared to other good supports. 
https://imgur.com/v6DXITJ
45% WR. REALLY RITO?  

Just played today with Karma agains't Nami. Looks like Nami is a new Soraka. 

Sry for bad english :C

replies.body:
Nami takes way more skill than Soraka so I object to that statement. 

However, karma does need help.
She needs to be made less oppressive early and more useful mid/late
